name: Jim Callender Web Developer
tagline: AWARD WINNING FREELANCE WORDPRESS DEVELOPER DESIGN
description:
Jim Callender is a expert Wordpress developer based in the UK. Specialising in Wordpress theme design & development, Ecommerce, Performance & WordPress support
MY BACKGROUND
I've over 10 years of solid commercial contracting experience, delivering high profile web products on time & on budget. Working from my office in Brighton & or onsite in London.
I provide the technical expertise for charities, startups, local government, PR & marketing companies, design agencies & global brands on a wide range of digital projects.
THE WHOLE SOLUTION, NOT JUST A SERVICE!
I'm mindful that I can offer the whole solution to clients. I do this by creating trust, being a trusted colleague of your network, and sharing ideas freely, which all add value to many of my successful long-term relationships with clients.
FREELANCER OF THE YEAR AWARD WINNER
I won the Xchange team's national award in 2007, and came highly commended for digital excellence in 2011. These were both for the high quality of web projects that I have been delivering to a wide variety of respected London agencies and International companies whilst I have been freelancing.
READ MORE...
